name: Ordering.compares_lt
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : LT α
a b : α
⊢ Eq (Ordering.lt.Compares a b) (LT.lt a b)
decl: @[simp] lemma compares_lt [LT α] (a b : α) : Compares lt a b = (a < b) := rfl

name: Ordering.compares_eq
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : LT α
a b : α
⊢ Eq (Ordering.eq.Compares a b) (Eq a b)
decl: @[simp] lemma compares_eq [LT α] (a b : α) : Compares eq a b = (a = b) := rfl

name: Ordering.compares_gt
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : LT α
a b : α
⊢ Eq (Ordering.gt.Compares a b) (GT.gt a b)
decl: @[simp] lemma compares_gt [LT α] (a b : α) : Compares gt a b = (a > b) := rfl
